document_data.name: ''Vessel of Vaporous Stones''
document_data.basicrefs: {{Cite card/Spellfire: Master the Magic/Forgotten Realms Chase|3/25}}
document_data.mainbody: '''''Vessel of Misty Passage''''' was a very rare [[enchanted]] receptacle that carried strengthening magics.
document_data.Effects: When activated, a ''vessel of vaporous stones'' produced a cloud of mist that invigorated and toughened the vessel's owner and their allies. The magic was especially useful when they were facing overwhelming odds in battle.
